arts.ttl: Aryna Sabalenka photographs disputed ball mark during Stuttgart
arts.sum: World No. 1 Aryna Sabalenka receives code violation after taking photo of contested call in win over Mertens. In a […] The post Aryna Sabalenka photographs disputed ball mark during Stuttgart appeared first on Tennishead.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Player Ratings | Union Berlin and Stuttgart Serve Up an Easter Classic
arts.sum: Union Berlin and VfB Stuttgart broke a Bundesliga record today as they shared eight goals in the first half of their Bundesliga clash. The 4-4 draw was enough to secure…

arts.ttl: Union Berlin, Stuttgart set Bundesliga record with explosive opening half
arts.sum: Saturday's clash between Union Berlin and Stuttgart was locked at 4-4 at half-time, the first time eight goals have been scored in the first 45 minutes of a Bundesliga game.

arts.ttl: Goals galore in the capital as Union Berlin vs. VfB Stuttgart sets new record
arts.sum: It was pure footballing chaos in the German capital on Saturday, with Union Berlin's home encounter against VfB Stuttgart producing first-half goals like never before! Supporters packed inside the Stadion An der Alten Försterei for the Matchday 30 encounter were treated to a record-breaking eight goals as the teams incredibly entered the changing rooms following the half-time whistle level at 4-4.

arts.ttl: Christopher Trimmel: 5 things on Union Berlin's stalwart captain
arts.sum: Following the news of Christopher Trimmel's signing a one-year contract extension with Union Berlin, bundesliga.com digs up five things you may not have known about the capital club's long-time full-back and captain... He led Die Eisernen to a third-placed finish and then, in the promotion play-off against VfB Stuttgart, Trimmel provided the assist for Marvin Friedrich's leveller in the first leg in Swabia - the goal that ended up tipping the balance in Union's favour and earning the Berlin club promotion to the Bundesliga for the first time in their history.

arts.ttl: Hoeness provides injury update ahead of Stuttgart's clash with Union Berlin
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart coach Sebastian Hoeness has revealed that Jamie Leweling will miss the game against Union Berlin and that Deniz Undav will start.

arts.ttl: Struggling VfB Stuttgart attacker Deniz Undav receives guaranteed start this weekend
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart trainer Sebastian Hoeneß backed struggling German attacker Deniz Undav for a start this weekend while speaking at his Friday pre-match press conference.
Christopher Trimmel will enter his 12th season with Union Berlin after extending his contract.

arts.ttl: Official | Union Berlin captain Christopher Trimmel signs contract extension
arts.sum: FC Union Berlin confirmed a contract extension for veteran captain Christopher Trimmel on Friday morning.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs. VfB Stuttgart preview: Die Eisernen look to secure safety
arts.sum: Union Berlin will aim to mathematically secure their Bundesliga survival on Saturday evening as they welcome Stuttgart to Stadion An der Alten Försterei.
